title: 2005 UCI Juniors World Championships – Women's road race
text: The women's road race at the <a href="2005%20UCI%20Juniors%20World%20Championships">2005 UCI Juniors World Championships</a> cycling event took place on 14 August in <a href="Salzburg">Salzburg</a>, Austria. The race was 70.00 km long. 82 cyclists participated in the race and 75 finished.
